job.title: Back End Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Financial Services
job.description:
Title: Back End Software Engineer
Locations: Boston, MA, Merrimack, NH, Smithfield, RI, Jersey City, NJ, Raleigh, NC, Westlake, TX, Salt Lake City, UT
Duration: 12+ months (no tenure limits multi-year)
H1 and Green Card Sponsorship is available through our company - Direct client relationship.
Strong Java/J2EE development working on enterprise level applications Good understanding of Cloud applications architecture and micro services model development including IaaS, PaaS, SaaS (AWS or Azure) Strong knowledge of MicroService Architecture and Development Experience with Agile development methodologies such as SCRUM, TDD etc. You have good verbal and written communication skills, can successfully communicate with other team members and build positive relationships Understanding of Agile systems development techniques utilizing Continuous Integration (CI)/Continuous Deployment (CD) and DevOps Client-side language, library, and framework proficiency: Angular 8+, JavaScript/TypeScript, Node, NPM, HTML/CSS, RxJS Messaging frameworks such as Kafka or JMS Exposure to AWS, 12 Factor application design or any similar cloud knowledge (EKS)
Messaging frameworks such as Kafka or JMS - plus Exposure to AWS, 12 Factor application design or any similar cloud knowledge (EKS) - plus
#Dice-SPG
#Zip-SPG
